--- In gladiator@y..., "Rory Wilde" <laughingmadman@h...> wrote:
> "Trust me, the first sign of flames {emphasis: plural) will result 
in
> some action being taken (you sure don't want to know all the 
available
> tricks a moderator has for yahoo groups.)."
> 
> Yeah, actually i do want to know what tricks you guys get.

The list of tricks for moderators or things moderators can do:
  1)ban members
  2)require moderator approval for someone to join a group
  3)limit who can post messages
  4)control who can read message archives in a group
  5)control who can vote in polls in a group
  6)require moderator approval for posting a message

I hope I never ever have to resort to banning members and/or requiring 
moderator approval for posting a message in this group.  I can  
understand being paranoid if a group is about certain things.

The other group I am moderating (which I am the owner of) isn't so 
free about how can join the group and who can read message archives.  
But that group is for a different purpose.
